eshmun.expression.modalities

Class AbstractCTLModality

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.expression.AbstractExpression
      • eshmun.expression.modalities.AbstractCTLModality
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryCTLModality, UnaryCTLModality

    public abstract class AbstractCTLModality
extends AbstractExpression
    This class consists of abstract methods that help facilities dealing with CTL Modalities.

    All CTL Modalities inherit from this class (directly or indirectly).

    All CTL Modalities used are simplified into a minimal set of modalities:

    {AV, EV, EX}

    This is helpful when simplifying, negating, or checking for equality between modalities.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab
    See Also:
    AbstractExpression, Minimal set of modalities
